review.comment: Opening a medical clinic and went through a bad experience with Sam. Tried to work with him for a course of over 4 months, but there were multiple issues with delays, and scheduling. Price adjustments would change, blamed on us for misrepresenting the job, even if the parameters of the job were known beforehand. It resulted in a termination of the agreement. Despite not even starting the job, he did not refund our deposit of $6000. Ultimately, did not take responsibility for his issues and in the end we could not trust his actions.
review.review_reply: This is a fake review by a fake client.

review.comment: I used this company for a small commercial space we newly leased. Timing was of the essence and I met a very comfortable and non pushy sales attitude from the owner. The job was very well done and completed as agreed upon. I feel confident recommending this company to everyone.
review.review_reply: Hi Atif. Thank you for your kind words. It was a pleasure working together for a common goal.

review.comment:
This company is honest and willing to go the extra mile.
To be honest Sam and his crew showed up and performed as expected. We polished our basement and we were extremely. My wife and the kids use the space now as a rec room, where before we couldn't enter. I strongly recommend this company
review.review_reply:
Hi Ron. It was our pleasure to work with you and your family. We take each project big or small and do our best to give our clients the best quality work as we know you will enjoy the workmanship for years to come.
Thank you for your kind words and we are at your service for any further help we can offer.

review.comment:
The guys went above and beyond my expectations.
We were very surprised how concrete polishing brought back the life on our old concrete floors. The place is totally transformed and we are excited about going to work again. I would recommend Sam and his crew to anyone!
review.review_reply: Hi Paula. You and your husband are lovely. You guys made us feel at home from the time we met. We can’t wait till we bring our families to meet yours. Real pleasure getting to know you guys!

review.comment: Sam and his team saved both our project AND our sanity.  I am convinced that other floor companies would have walked away from our project but he came through and we are eternally grateful.  First off, he was quick to answer our distress call and was there with his team in short-order with a great attitude.  When the job put up a fight, him he fought back with the largest floor grinder I'd ever seen.  He even worked through a long weekend to make sure the floors were perfect and that we got back on schedule.  Today, when guests enter our space it's the floors they notice first and I have Sam to thank for that.  Don't look elsewhere, hire Epoxy101 for your next job!
review.review_reply:
Thanks for your very kind words!
We definitely got a little more than we bargained for with that concrete.
It has ban one of the hardest simple projects I’ve been involved with.
But there is always an answer I find with concrete.
We couldn’t have done our best for a better couple of blokes thank you and your company.
Cheers to many years of business and a great floor!
Sam
Thank you Reshna!
Thank you Jennifer!

review.comment: Sam and his crew did a fantastic job polishing our new concrete floor in the basement.  He talked my wife and I through the polishing process before the work began, and even stopped progress to ensure we were okay with the desired aggregate and shine.  Great experience from start to finish - would definitely recommend to family and friends!
review.review_reply:
Hi Miro,

Thanks for your kind words.
We love doing good work for good people.
I hope you and your wonderful family enjoy the floor for many years to come.

Sam,

review.comment:
The guys at concrete epoxy 101 did a phenomenal job for us in a timely manner.
We had to finish our job and move in before the end of the month and they did everything possible to help us with timing.
I was able to move in time and the floors look great.
I recommend this company for honesty and quality.
review.review_reply:
Hi Sam,

Thank you for your kind words. We run a business as well and we realize things don’t always fall into place as we imagine and hope. We do  our best to try and accommodate our clients.
Thanks for the review and great working with you!
Good luck with the new endeavour!

review.comment:
Sam came in on the same day that I called to provide a free quotation.
We made a deal and he kept my timeline in mind the entire time.
He kept his promise on timing and great quality.
I had my project completed quicker than expected. One of the best contractor experiences I have had.I recommend this company to everyone.
review.review_reply:
Hi Ryan,
Thank you for your kind words.
We were very happy to have met you and your family. Thank you for allowing us into your home and trusting us to give you a beautiful floor.
Thank you for your business!
Sam

review.comment:
Sam and his team were great! It never seemed to be about the money but about doing the job right and making sure we were happy with the job. He went above and beyond to make sure the job was done right. Never rushed. Always taking the time to take feed back on the work and fixing any imperfections.
Will definitely call him again.
review.review_reply: Those are very kind words Raj. We are happy these days to see likeminded businesses staying positive and moving forward. We appreciate your business and putting your trust in us to give you a beautiful floor to last many years to come!

review.comment: I couldn't be more impressed with the end result of my garage! Sam and his team are all A+ guys who worked hard, were on time, friendly and cordial. The work, the clean up and the overall project went smoother than expected! Highly recommend!
review.review_reply:
Hi Jordan,

It was a pleasure working for you.
Your family is wonderful.
Thanks for having us and allowing us to do what we do best!

review.comment:
Great staff!
Great team.

Polished floors are amazing!
Couldn’t have asked for a better job.
Very professional and I highly recommend this company.
review.review_reply:
Hi Sam,

Great name by the way!
It was our pleasure working for you. Our entire crew appreciates your hospitality and we hope you enjoy your floors for many years to come!

review.comment:
We booked Sam and his team to remove our carpet floor and provide us with a smooth and beautiful polished concete.  The floor was nearly 7000 square feet and was part of a major renovation we are doing at a banquet hall in vaughan, it had to be perfect so our clients would impressed at seeing something other then carpet at a banquet venue.  They worked non stop it seemed like for nearly 2 weeks and the final result was beautiful.  They are still planning to come back and give it another polish before we open to make sure it impresses.  I would recommend Sam and Concrete Epoxy to anyone
Dave@Bellagio
review.review_reply:
Hi Dave!
I know with this COVID-19 you guys have been a business that has been hit the hardest. My heart goes out to you and your staff. I love how you guys keep your heads help up high and will recover stronger than ever!

Hi A.Harrison,

I have checked every job we have done and nobody by your name exists.
We know each and every client and we try our best to bring our best.
You are not one of our clients.

Take care,
Sam
Thanks Amira for your kindness!

review.comment: Amazing service  great communication from Sam  the crew was very polite and very clean job  I highly recommend this company to everyone
review.review_reply: You were a gracious host and we enjoyed our time with you!

review.comment: Sam and his crew have my store looking amazing! Very professional and they make quality of their work a number 1 priority. Would HIGHLY recommend!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Michael for your kind words. From our team to your family, our wife rest thanks!

review.comment: Great service. Very clean crew. The amount of dust we expected was limited. The concrete polishing was exactly what we needed to bring the wow factor to our retail outlet. Thanks guys
review.review_reply: Thank you Blake. It was really our pleasure. Thank you for your business!

review.comment: The guys were very polite and did an amazing job no my concrete floors in my warehouse. Couldn't ask for a better job. I strongly recommend concrete epoxy 101 to everyone.
review.review_reply:
Thank you john for your kind words!
You were a true gentleman.

review.comment:
Sam and his crew came in and provided me with a quote the same day I called. I had to open my warehouse in three weeks and I had hired another company to put epoxy down and they performed a dismal job.
They understood my panic and made time for me to fix the previous job and charged me a fair price knowing that I was stuck in a situation that was not very comfortable.
I strongly recommend concrete epoxy 101 to everyone!
review.review_reply: Hi Sarah. Thank you so much for having us join your family for the time we spent with yours.

review.comment: sam and his were very professional and they treated my new business as if it there own. my new hair salon feels double the size and i cant stop hearing compliments about my floor. thanks guys for sll your hard work!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: I had Sam and his crew polish my new guitar shop and the service was amazing from first contact to the final check.
review.review_reply: Thanks for your kind words!

I recommend this company for all polishing concrete floors. My basement looks amazing and looks much bigger than the actual size.
We have our guests in the basement now and all parties are in the basement.
Thanks guys.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: Price , Quality, and SERVICE epoxy 101 makes sure job is done correctly!!! My floor was coated to perfection!!! Thank you SAM!!!

review.comment: We had Sam and his crew polish our restaurant and the place is transformed. From 5000 square feet it looks like double the size now and just looks phenomenal.  I highly recommend these guys to everyone. Thanks guys!

review.comment: Sam and his team did approx 10,000 sqft of concrete polishing in my plant.  He and his team worked diligently during our Christmas shutdown and did a fabulous job.  Definitely recommend his work.   Tom

review.comment: I had my office polished by the guys at concrete epoxy 101. Sam showed up and delivered on time and budget. I would highly recommend this company to anyone. Thanks guys

review.comment: Sam did some work for my dad, after seeing the polished concrete in his office I knew it was the perfect look for my basement. He managed to patch and fix a few major cracks and gave the floor the high gloss look I wanted. Great job!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: The guys were very prompt. We negotiated the price and they got the work done as promised. Our floors have never looked better. We recommend these guys based on there professionalism, clean work ethics and promptness.

review.comment:
These guys did my office and were in and out in exactly the amount of time they promised...Great Job, very clean and on time!
Cant do better than that in my books!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: Really nice and reliable crew! They are fair in pricing and there followthrough. My office needed to have the carpets removed and the glue to be removed and replaced with polished concrete. It looks amazing and we are very happy with the work the guys did for us. Thanks Sam
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: These guys are extremely friendly and fair in there pricing. My wife and I are loving our new polished floors .professional, reliable and fair VB are the best way to explain these guys. We recommend this company to anyone!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment:
my restaurant was in bad shape and the guys from concrete epoxy 101 came in and we went through my options. We decided on polishing the concrete. They did an amazing job. We tried a high level of shine on our floors and couldn't be happier. I can see myself on the floor now:)
I would recommend these guys based on professionalism and final product. Thanks guys
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: I have a two car garage I was looking to have polished. I came across Concrete Epoxy 101, Sasan listen carefully and noted all the details of my project. To my surprise, he showed up a couple hours later to inspect the job and provide a quote. He gave me a few different options, which I found other companies didn’t provide. We scheduled the job to be done a couple days later. As promised, Sasan showed up on time ready to work.  Very pleased with the whole process, professional, great prices, great work ethic, produced excellent results, highly recommend them. Pleasure to deal with on every level!!! Happy Customer!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: I had my concrete floors in my new flower shop polished by the guys at concrete epoxy 101. I was pleasently surprised by the clean job and professional attitude of the entire staff. Thanks guys!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind words!

review.comment: Couldnt ask for better service. They worked hard until the job was done. They were in and out so fast but it is the best work I’ve come across.
